definitions.text: a quantity that does not vary
a number representing a quantity assumed to have a fixed value in a specified mathematical context
examples: the velocity of light is a constant

definitions.text: steadfast in purpose or devotion or affection
examples: a man constant in adherence to his ideals

definitions.text: uninterrupted in time and indefinitely long continuing
examples: night and day we live with the incessant noise of the city
the perpetual struggle to maintain standards in a democracy
man's unceasing warfare with drought and isolation
